threads.com:
Every day the same, the beatings, the manipulation, the abuse, haunting his dreams as he begs for death again and again, the wurm burrowing into his skull...the Brand, etching itself upon his skin, cursed by the dark goddess and destined to be hated and cursed forever more. Why won't the night terrors leave him be!?

What sins has he committed, what gods had had he offended, innocent, innocent he says, had hurt not one person or thing! Why must these specters haunt him so!? Eldakar, that is his cursed name, he who knows too much. Cursed by fate and the gods themselves. A black lamb to be rent apart by the wretched world.

Then an wretched arrow came and struck him in the eye, piercing his cursed globe and mind, falling from the slave steed, tumbling down, down and down off the cliff, then blackness again. Though the dreams still remain, please, please, please release him from the pain! Wake up!
---
>Scream!!!
>Gasp!
>Awake with tears and sweat...

Floor Bored - The OG OC NEET from the very first threads. Floor comes in all different forms, but she's typically portrayed as a horny and kinda dirty mare most of the time. (https://derpibooru.org/images/2321489)

threads.com:
This will be deleted so it'll be quick. Today's an exceptionally special day as it marks 10 years since Milky Way's Tumblr started. The tumblr is now age-restricted but you can view the posts here starting from the back: https://www.tumbex.com/milkmare-of-trottingham.tumblr/posts?page=10

Milky's special talent quickly gained the blog over 1400 watchers in less than two weeks. It was especially embraced on /mlp/ where the thread generated several times more content than the tumblr which was only in its second day: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/5678650/#q5678650 Milky had a continuous presence for months afterwards as a general thread.

Fast forward to May 2013 and it was on its 71st general thread: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/10866090/#q10866090 The thread was deleted early and the incident shrugged off, but unbeknownst to them it was right before some of the most eventful days in /mlp/ history. Lauren Faust would visit /mlp/ a few days later https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/ and all hell broke loose, even prompting a reply from Moot (https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/500/3/#q10906860). But attention quickly turned to "The Scruffening", a mass deletion of various threads and general confusion over the following days. Milky Way threads were quickly deleted from then on, later confirmed as bannable content due to its NSFW nature: https://desuarchive.org/q/thread/640332/#q641855 Some claimed that Lauren's visit sparked the sudden SFW enforcement but this remains inconclusive.

Milky Way threads have occasionally been posted over the years, lasting only a few minutes to several hours at a time. While the blog's creator remains active (https://twitter.com/FlashEquestria), the blog itself hasn't had a new post in a year.

Not expecting a discussion here. This one's for the archives.

Fen Flower is not out of indignities about the adepts of Smitin. You nod and sometimes snicker at the huge mare who vents out her frustration, and slowly calms down as she goes.

Unfortunately, you can’t completely dismiss what the inquisitor mare said to you. There is indeed a possibility Fen Flower could be in danger. You’d rather not find out one day that Fen Flower has been possessed by evil intent. Well, it would be incredibly hot to see an evil giantess mare crush or eat or enslave ponies left and right of course, but for the short time before she would kill you or get herself arrested or worst, it probably isn’t worth it…

“Fen Flower.” You start once Fen Flower is done blaspheming. “I just want you to know that we’ll see this problem through, and we’ll resolve it together if we have to.”
“A problem? What problem?” Fen Flower frowns at you. “This is all behind me now. Or do you really believe a word they said about me? My contract ended! There’s no way I could be influenced in any way anymore!”
“Well…” You show an embarrassed cringe. “I’m afraid this is well within the means of a devil to do so…”
“But… But that’s not possible!” Fen Flower protests. “I mean, this devil’s trick was to let me in control. I knew I had to obey or else I would lose my soul, but I was never compelled to do something in particular…”
The mare lets out a sigh. Looking at the ground in silence.

“Fucking shit. These nerds Are kinda right about this issue, aren’t they?”
“Fen Flower. Like I said, I’ll be looking out for you no matter comes next.” While you speak, you rub your side against one hind leg of Fen Flower. It might have the girth of it, but your friend’s leg is warmer and softer than a tree trunk.

“Thank you, Little Spoon.” The huge mare smirks, and her large hoof comes from above to affectionately ruffle your mane. “Anyway, let’s hear what the foresters have to say about their ent problem. Before we leave the city, I’ll go find some generic countermeasures for the time being. Potions, a charm or whatever to repel outsider influence just in case.”
“I’ll come with you!” Pear Plum speaks up. “I’m not sure I have the capacities, but there’s a chance I could help.”
“Oh, uhm…” After the surprise, the big alchemist mare nods. “Sure. I appreciate that. I’ll look deeper into this when we come back, and hopefully figure out something. If we’re lucky, these paladins might even take care of my former contractor for us.”

For the time being, you head for the guild of foresters.
This place looks more like an office, and this time Fen Flower has a bit of trouble squeezing herself in the hall for visitors. There’s a desk where you can ask for the contractor. While you wait, you take a look at the pieces of carpentry and forest maps displayed in the hall. Meanwhile, the rest of the workers and civilians present can’t help but to contemplate the 17’ Fen Flower, as much to make sure not to become victim of any unplanned movement in this confided space than to appreciate her attributes.

After a minute, your contractor arrive from behind the counter.

“Hello adventurers.” A mare with a bright red mane and orange coat approaches. She must be around 30 years old. “A pleasure to meet you. I’m Red Maple. I heard you’ve come for our ents issue, correct?”
“Indeed.” Pear Plum speaks. “I read there would be more details to be heard.”
“Ah, yes of course.” Red Maple nods. “I’ll show you where your targets have been sighted so you may track them down. There’s 9 of them. Most are around 10’ tall, but the biggest of them is closer to 20. I see you’re up for the challenge, though.”
The guild mare gives a wink to your huge alchemist friend.

“Uhm…” Pear Plum speaks up again. “If you don’t mind, what I mean to ask was… well, do you know why these ents got so vindictive? This is highly unhabitual for them to even leave their woods, let alone attack ponies at random.”
“Unfortunately, I don’t believe there’s time to solve this mystery.” The mare from the guild shakes her head. “We don’t know what happened and couldn’t find any clues. I strongly suggest you put them out of their misery. They’re just too dangerous for everypony at this point.”
“Oh, uhm…” Pear Plum falls silent, but you can tell she’s not happy with what she was told.

This story sounds a bit fishy to you too. You know little about ents, but indeed they’re not your usual wandering monsters.

Welcome to the Pony Voice Preservation Project!
youtu.be/730zGRwbQuE

The Pony Preservation Project is a collaborative effort by /mlp/ to build and curate pony datasets for as many applications in AI as possible.

Technology has progressed such that a trained neural network can generate convincing voice clips, drawings and text for any person or character using existing audio recordings, artwork and fanfics as a reference. As you can surely imagine, AI pony voices, drawings and text have endless applications for pony content creation.

AI is incredibly versatile, basically anything that can be boiled down to a simple dataset can be used for training to create more of it. AI-generated images, fanfics, wAIfu chatbots and even animation are possible, and are being worked on here.

Any anon is free to join, and there are many active tasks that would suit any level of technical expertise. If you’re interested in helping out, take a look at the quick start guide linked below and ask in the thread for any further detail you need.

EQG and G5 are not welcome.

I can't do Mega. I'm much more space-limited on Mega (I'd need 3 accounts to store the character animations there), and it's too difficult to keep multiple repos up-to-date with the same data across platforms.
I was expecting people to only download the specific animations they wanted, which is why I uploaded each one separately. That's probably why it's slow to download if you're trying to download the whole folder. I can pack everything into a few 7z files and upload those. That should be much faster.
>Also, as many files as it'd likely make. Do you think it'd be worth it to have an addition depository where animations are instead stored as folders containing each frame as a PNG?
The webp files don't have that color limitation, and the new dump contains webp files. Those should be pretty accurate.
I can't upload each frame individually since that would be too much data, but:
- If you're fine with the webp resolution and quality, I can give you a script that will turn a webp file into a sequence of pngs.
- If you want the frames at a higher resolution and quality, you can download the original XFL files, and I can give you a command that will look up the source of a webp file and re-render each frame as an svg. With this, you can also render each frame as a larger png, but some of the tools I'm using to convert to png can't handle huge image resolutions.

threads.com:
>What is this?
an ARG about pony fandom history and a mysterious mare that's been with us through it all.
Tolerance, or Tolly for short, is a mysterious internet mare that has been watching and documenting the fandom since its beginning.
She's been around since October 2010, but hasn't been able to talk to us until this February.
Tolly posts pictures to the board with the caption "I felt too happy, so I made this"
Her pictures appear on a website, https://withtolerance.horse, and lead to various puzzles which in turn lead to journal entries of hers that she means to keep private.
She set up a way to communicate with us directly at https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages. Send her a message and decode her response with https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/hex-analysis or with this userscript https://u.smutty.horse/mfzuqpfndow.js
Tolly is excited to finally be able to talk to us, but she's dying, and she doesn't have much time left.

>How can I get caught up?
Installing the userscript and reading through a handful of the early responses (and a few of the latest ones) on https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages might be the best way to get caught up with the narrative side of things, for a lot of the puzzles you should be fine to just jump right in. They're generally pretty self-contained.

>Be Summer Storm
>Once human, now thestral mare
>Now a full grown adult, you’ve received your first full blown diplomatic mission!
>Join Prince Gladius of Griffonia on a hunt, something your fellow ponies weren’t too comfortable with
>Something about killing another animal didn’t sit right with them or something
>You hunted back when you were a human so you weren’t too cut up about it


>You meet the Prince at the edge of Whitetail Woods
>There was a population of normal deer, the nonsentient kind
>Gladius was a large griffon, his eagle half resplendent with dappled snow-white feathers and piercing green eyes
>His feline half bore light brown fur, lovingly tended to by its owner to ensure an almost shiny quality
>Wearing naught but a small circulet around his temples, Gladius headed over to you, his beak curled into a smirk
>The griffon easily towered over your short pony form by a good head and shoulders, forcing you to crane your neck a bit to look him in the eyes.
>”Greetings, you must be Summer Storm.” Gladius’ voice came out in a smooth rumble, kind of like a waterfall
>”An ya must be Prince Gladius.” You offer a hoof in greeting. “Ah thought ya’d be taller.”
>Gladius blinks in surprise for a moment before shaking your hoof. “I will admit, I am a bit surprised to know the rumors of your accent is true. Suits you, though.”
>You offer a small chuckle in response. “Thank ya. So, ya ready to hunt?”
>Gladius nods and offers a smirk, a predatory look in his eyes
>”Of course. Are you ready? No offense, but ponies are often squeamish when it comes to hunting prey.”
>You can’t help but grin, showing off the two long canines that mark you out as a thestral.
>Well, that and the bat wings and stuff but shush
>You gesture a hoof towards the two daggers sitting in their scabbards on your hip
>Blow the bit of your rainbow mane that slid in front of your eyes out of it.
>”Ready. Ain’t mah first hunt, used to hunt deer all the time as a little filly with mah Pa.”
>Gladius blinks before looking to the side, an almost blush coating his feathered cheeks

>Be a simple doe
>Trotting along through the forest with your herd, looking for soft berries
>Pause, hearing something ruffling above you
>Probably just a bird
>You go back to nibbling on some leaves before you feel a sharp pain in your flank
>Ow.png
>With a yelp you jump away from the pain, seeing a flash of color go by
>You see another glint of silver before a second sharp pain rings over your barrel
>You let out another yelp of pain and start running away from the source
>With a flurry of hooffalls you trot as fast as you physically can
>Turning around to look behind you, you see that same splash of color move back into the tree branches with a flap of its wings
>You run until your heart feels like it’s about to burst out of your heart, pausing to catch your breath in a clearing
>You carefully make your way to the river at the edge of the clearing for some water, your back leg and barrel screaming in pain from your wounds.
>A loud ruffle of feathers sound out above you
>You barely have time to look up to see a massive griffon flying down at you, claws out
>You rear back but don’t have time to escape your imminent death

>Be Summer Storm
>You hop out of the forest into the clearing the solitary doe ran to
>In the clearing is Gladius, his white feathers and claws bloodied
>The source of the blood lays beneath him
>The doe that you drove away from the herd lies dead, her throat torn out by Gladius’ talons
>”Looks like yer ready for dinner Gladius.” you chuckle
>You pass by Gladius, heading towards the river in search for fish
>You flick his side with your tail, giving him a smirk as you go
>”Why don’t ya go get some wood for a fire while Ah get some fish for myself?”
>Gladius barks out a laugh but steps back into the trees, his bulk snapping some low hanging branches
>Meanwhile you wait patiently at the riverbank before....
>SNAP
>You plunge your head in and grab a fish, your adorable thestral fangs allowing you to grab it in your mouth

(And then I’ll post the rest when I get home from work)

>What is Flutterrape?
Flutterrape is a collection of stories about ponies trying and failing to have sex with Anon, the only human in Equestria. While the title implies that it is Fluttershy trying to rape Anon, others may follow in her stead and attempt their own versions of rape. There are different versions of Flutterrape, but most are light-hearted comedies about the ponies failing in their attempts to get into Anon’s pants. Just because your story has Anon in it, doesn't mean it fits in this thread. Check other threads (AiE, RGRE etc) about story content before posting.

threads.name: Anonymous
threads.com:
This is a thread dedicated to the preservation and archival of pony content, from YouTube and other sites.

>Where can I find deleted pony stuff?
In general:
https://www.theponyarchive.com/
https://warp.theponyarchive.com/ (TPA file search)
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/channels/ (user-friendly TPA frontend)

Specific YouTube videos by ID:
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/videos/VIDEOID
https://tpa.mares.workers.dev/?id=VIDEOID&output=html
https://web.archive.org/web/*/http://wayback-fakeurl.archive.org/yt/VIDEOID

If you can't find something, ask in the thread - many anons have private archives. When requesting YouTube content, include the video id, channel name, and/or video title if possible.

>How do I archive stuff?
yt-dlp: https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp#installation
Supports downloading from YouTube and a fuckload of other sites.
Make sure to use flags that properly save additional metadata (thumbnail, description, .info.json etc).
This is the config I use: https://github.com/rebane2001/sensible-yt-dlp-archive-scripts
yt-dlp also has many GUI frontends available in case the terminal is too scary for you.
Tube Archivist: https://github.com/tubearchivist/tubearchivist
A user-friendly self-hostable website for archiving videos. I have not used it myself so I don't know if it is any good, but I've heard good things about it.

You can also link content to be archived in the thread if you'd like other anons to take care of it.

>Useful resources
Everything: https://www.voidtools.com/
Windows program for searching all of your files instantly.

Feel free to suggest resources and other information to include in the next OP.

threads.com:
I saw Starlight Glimmer the other day as I was walking into a grocery store. I didn't recognize her at just a glance but I instantly did a double take and sure enough it was her. She was looking at me and when our eyes met she gave me a goofy smile then started waving her hands in front of her face because I'm sure she knew that I knew who she was. I said it was nice to meet her but that I didn't want to annoy her and ask for pictures or anything. She said "you mean like you're doing right now?" I was taken aback; all I could say was "eh? She kept lurching forward, going "eh? eh?" while closing her hand in front of my face. I walked away and continued with my shopping, and I heard her chuckle as I walked off. When I came to pay for my stuff up front I saw her trying to walk out the doors with like fifteen Milky Ways in her hands without paying. The girl at the counter was very nice about it and professional, and was like “Ma'am, you need to pay for those first.” At first she kept pretending to be tired and not hear her, but eventually turned back around and brought them to the counter.
When the cashier took one of the bars and started scanning it multiple times, she stopped her and told her to scan them each individually “to prevent any electrical interference,” and then turned around and winked at me. After she scanned each bar and put them in a bag and started to say the price, she kept interrupting her by yawning really loudly.

The love poison from Hearts and Hooves Day doesn't make ponies love each other. The gaze of a pony is naturally magically enchanting. They've also developed natural resistances to it as a result. What happens is that the love poison suppresses that resistance, making them vulnerable to being captured in the eyes of another pony.
You, as a creature with no magic, are always vulnerable to that pony power by default. All it takes is a pony maintaining eye contact with you long enough to put you under their spell.

threads.com:
https://tiermaker.com/create/bronies-react-15441096

Rank ACRacebest’s Bronies React series! I’ll explain my personal rankings below.

Teens React to MLP: S Tier - Absolutely hilarious and perfectly executed. They critiqued the video well while also not taking themselves seriously at all and providing a bunch of hilarious lines. This series could not have started off better.

Derpy/College Humor My Little Brony: C Tier - Mainly just a discussion about these topics. Cool time capsules and the guys made good points, but besides that not much interesting or comedic here.

Cupcakes: B Tier - Only first few minutes are reactions to the actual video, which were hilarious. The rest of it is just a discussion about it. Pretty fun overall, especially Saberspark’s disgust.

Season 2 Finale/Season 3 Premiere: A Tier - First couple episode reactions, and very fun. I wish they were a bit longer and they feel a bit rushed. However, that is understandable since these was the first ones, and its really cool to see all these guys react first time to such old episodes

Season 3 Finale: S Tier - We have now hit the sweet spot in the pacing of the episode reacts. Has enough reactions so that everything interesting is covered without feeling rushed but few enough so that it doesn’t drag on and is very rewatchable. AcRacebest’s theories and how he edited those segments were the highlight here. The gold standard to follow for these.

Equestria Girls Trailer: A Tier - Really good mix of comedy and serious discussion on the topic at hand. An interesting variety of takes, with a good overall message about how the drama was overblown and the best solution was to wait and see if the movie would be good.

Equestria Girls Movie: S Tier - Once again, great pacing for an episode react, and since this movie is so easy to make fun of they had great material to work with. And BlackGryph0n literally skydived on video just to complain about Flash Sentry. Nuff said. (1/4)

threads.name: Colto
threads.com:
Darkness surrounded you, an impenetrable force binding you as day after day your instincts struggled to gain freedom, ram, bash, crack! Again and again, you don't know how long or soon it took until the first crack chipped away, another, then the next, and before long, it shatters! An Stony shell surrounding you splinters to pieces as you gasp for breath, collapsing as your joints felt strained and rigid, unpleasantness all around...

Groaning, you pull yourself to the water as you reach in to drink and sip some life instilling liquid into your body. Refreshing and all too satisfying. Then your reflection appeared in it's reflection...an being reflected as two futures struggled for the same space.
>Erudikas, the Last Hero

-Male
-Royal Guard Class
